info.title: Backbone Debt Capturing API
info.description:
- alpha: Currently developed API version. Subject to major changes.
- beta: A semi-stable early access version. New features can be added. Breaking changes are possible.
- stable: The API is recommended for use in production.

[Changelog](https://debt-capturing-api.conqore.niceshops.com/v1/docs/changelog.html)

All data is transferred in UTF-8 encoding.\
The API uses stateless HTTP. No cookies have to be kept.\
Authentication via OAuth2 client credentials flow.

[Privacy Policy](https://www.niceshops.com/en/dienstleistungen/data-privacy-policy)

[Backbone Debt Capturing API PHP client @Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/datenkraft/bb-debt-capturing-api-php-client)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to read. Default is the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum size per page is 100. Default is 100.

parameters.name: paginationMode
parameters.description:
The paginationMode to use:
- default: The total number of items in the collection will not be calculated.
- totalCount: The total number of items in the collection will be calculated. This can mean loss of performance.

parameters.description: A filter for restricting the audit log to a endpoint version.

parameters.name: filter[identifier]
parameters.description: A filter for querying actions for a identifier.

get.summary: Get the status of the event sourcing replay
get.description: Get the status of the event sourcing replay

post.description:
Execute event sourcing replay (recalculates DebtLineItems).

Please be aware of the effects a replay involves!
- The replay does not affect DebtLineItems with an Invoice_Id set.
- Changes of the calculators/prices will affect non invoiced, past, events
and therefore also the resulting DebtLineItems.
- At the beginning/before the replay starts, the DebtLineItems, which are not invoiced yet/no Invoice_Id set,
get deleted.
- If no projectIds are provided, all DebtLineItems are affected by the replay.

infoMailAddress.description: Email to send info messages about the event sourcing replay to

projectIds.description: Array of projectIds specifying the projects for which the DebtLineItems should be replayed

get.description:
Get debtLineItems file export by projectId and time range.
        The file type is controlled by the accept header.

parameters.name: filter[projectId]
parameters.description: This filter restricts the data by the project id.

parameters.name: filter[dateFrom]
parameters.description:
This filter enables retrieval of data starting from a specified date in UTC.
                The filters dateFrom and dateTo are required unless an invoiceId filter is given.

parameters.name: filter[dateTo]
parameters.description:
This filter enables retrieval of data ending up to a specified date in UTC.
                The filters dateFrom and dateTo are required unless an invoiceId filter is given.

parameters.name: filter[invoiceId]
parameters.description: This filter restricts the data by the invoice id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to read. Default is the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum size per page is 100. Default is 20.

parameters.name: paginationMode
parameters.description:
The paginationMode to use:
- default: The total number of items in the collection will not be calculated.
- totalCount: The total number of items in the collection will be calculated. This can mean loss of performance.

parameters.name: filter[projectId]
parameters.description: Mandatory filter for the project id

parameters.name: filter[skuCode]
parameters.description: Like Search for the sku code

parameters.name: filter[usageStart]
parameters.description: Start date of the usage (Y-m-d)

parameters.name: filter[usageEnd]
parameters.description: End date of the usage (Y-m-d)

parameters.name: filter[invoiceIds]
parameters.description: Comma delimited string of invoice ids

parameters.name: filter[metaKey]
parameters.description: Key of the skuUsage meta field (required with metaValue)

parameters.name: filter[metaValue]
parameters.description: Value of the skuUsage meta field (required with metaKey)

parameters.name: filter[invoiced]
parameters.description: Filter for invoiced or open (= not invoiced) debt line items

parameters.name: filter[debtLineItemIds]
parameters.description: debtLineItemIds filter

auditLog.description: Data to represent a audit log entry.

endpoint.description: The name of the audited endpoint.

version.description: The version of the audited endpoint.

confidentialContent.description: The GDPR relevant content of the resource.

requestId.description: The optional request ID of the endpoint call.

oauthClientId.description: The OAuth client id which did the change.

auditLogCollection.title: auditLogCollection
auditLogCollection.description: A collection of audit log entries

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number, may be null.

cutoffDate.description: The invoice includes all DebtLineItems with a usageStart and usageEnd date less or equal than the cutoff date, which existed and were not already invoiced at the time of processing the invoice.

page.description: The page contained in this collection.

pageSize.description: The page size used for reading the collection.

totalCount.description:
The total number of items in the collection.\
Note: This can be null depending on the used paginationMode.

id.description: Id of the debt line item

key.description: The key of the field causing the error

value.description: The value of the field causing the error

fieldReference.description: The exact reference to the field causing the error

identifiers.description: Contains key value pairs for single identifier

invoiceStatus.description:
The invoice status with the following possible values:
- processing: only initially set before the DebtLineItems have been linked with the invoice.
- completed: all DebtLineItems have been linked to the invoice.

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number. Once set, not nullable anymore.
